sentences.sContent: He used to buy them expensive presents, out of guilt.
sentences.sCn: 出于内疚，他以前总是给他们买昂贵的礼物。

sentences.sContent: He felt an enormous sense of guilt when he thought about how he’d treated her.
sentences.sCn: 他想到自己那样对待她，心里非常歉疚。

sentences.sContent: He did not deny his guilt.
His guilt was proved beyond all doubt by the prosecution.
sentences.sCn: 他的罪行已被原告方证实确凿无疑。

sentences.sContent: ...reducing the immediate guilt of not working on the tasks at hand by investing energy in the list...

words.tran: 无罪的，无辜的；没有…的，不知…的

trans.tranOther: a strong feeling of shame and sadness because you know that you have done something wrong
